author: Dawn M
title: Value + Location = Great Choice
text: I was looking for a conveniently located hotel that wouldn't break the bank but also wouldn't depress me, and my New Yorker friend recommended Hudson. Aesthetically, it's cool and funky with a great lobby. Our room was spacious and comfortable. Special shout out to Jade at the front desk who sent up a fruit tray for my mom's 70th birthday, along with a beautiful handwritten note. Her thoughtfulness was so appreciated. Everyone we encountered was extremely helpful.
